pyecharts.charts.composite_charts.timeline
==========================================

.. py:module:: pyecharts.charts.composite_charts.timeline


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   pyecharts.charts.composite_charts.timeline.Timeline


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: Timeline(init_opts: pyecharts.types.Init = opts.InitOpts(), render_opts: pyecharts.types.RenderInit = opts.RenderOpts())

   Bases: :py:obj:`pyecharts.charts.chart.Base`


   `Timeline` provides functions like switching and playing between multiple charts.


   .. py:attribute:: options


   .. py:method:: add_schema(axis_type: str = 'category', current_index: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 0, orient: str = 'horizontal', symbol: pyecharts.types.Optional[str] = None, symbol_size: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Numeric] = None, play_interval: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Numeric] = None, control_position: str = 'left', is_auto_play: bool = False, is_loop_play: bool = True, is_rewind_play: bool = False, is_timeline_show: bool = True, is_inverse: bool = False, pos_left: pyecharts.types.Optional[str] = None, pos_right: pyecharts.types.Optional[str] = None, pos_top: pyecharts.types.Optional[str] = None, pos_bottom: pyecharts.types.Optional[str] = '-5px', width: pyecharts.types.Optional[str] = None, height: pyecharts.types.Optional[str] = None, linestyle_opts: pyecharts.types.LineStyle = None, label_opts: pyecharts.types.Label = None, itemstyle_opts: pyecharts.types.ItemStyle = None, graphic_opts: pyecharts.types.Graphic = None, checkpointstyle_opts: pyecharts.types.TimeLinkCheckPoint = None, controlstyle_opts: pyecharts.types.TimeLineControl = None, progress_linestyle_opts: pyecharts.types.LineStyle = None, progress_itemstyle_opts: pyecharts.types.ItemStyle = None, progress_label_opts: pyecharts.types.Label = None)


   .. py:method:: add(chart: pyecharts.charts.chart.Base, time_point: str)
